alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Perry (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 11:51AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Perry and southern Dallas Counties through 1230 PM CDT... At 1151 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Central Mills, or 9 miles south of Uniontown, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Selma, Uniontown, Selmont-West Selmont, Orrville, Belknap, Bogue Chitto, Tyler, Central Mills, Dallas Lake, Old Cahaba Park, Memorial Stadium, Dallas County Horse Arena, Dannelly Reservoir, Skyharbor Airport, Whites Bluff, Safford, Hazen, Craig Field Aiport, Selma Drag Strip and Edmund Pettus Bridge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
